name: Political Biographies
description: Activists, revolutionaries, and political figures who challenged power and changed the rules of the game.

name: World Leaders
description: From Alexander the Great to FDR — the rulers, generals, and statesmen who built empires, won wars, and reshaped civilizations.

name: Civil Rights & Social Change
description: The people who fought for equality — from Frederick Douglass to Malala Yousafzai, nonviolence to direct action.

name: Scientific Biographies
description: The scientists who changed how we understand the universe — from Newton's laws to Turing's machines to Carson's silent spring.

name: Cultural Biographies
description: The artists, writers, and musicians who defined their eras — Shakespeare to Morrison, Mozart to Marley.
